# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We actively support the latest version of tag.directory.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please **do not** open a public issue.

Instead, please email security@tag.directory (or create a private security advisory on GitHub) with:
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if any)

We will respond within 48 hours and work with you to resolve the issue.

## Security Best Practices

When contributing blueprints:
- Never include API keys, secrets, or credentials
- Sanitize any user data in examples
- Follow security best practices for tracking implementations

Thank you for helping keep tag.directory secure!
